mapper.sql: a.book_id AS "bookId", a.book_isbn AS "bookIsbn", a.book_name AS "bookName", a.book_image AS "bookImage", a.book_author AS "bookAuthor", a.book_collections AS "bookCollections", a.book_introduction AS "bookIntroduction", a.book_directory AS "bookDirectory", a.book_contents AS "bookContents", a.book_guide AS "bookGuide", a.is_status AS "isStatus", a.book_publisherid AS "bookPublisherid", a.book_cashpledge AS "bookCashpledge", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.book_categoryid AS "bookCategoryid"
